entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Roblin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roblin 10:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -27.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -30.6°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
